snapshotIncentive.h1:
Are you managing Excel
or your hotel's demand?
snapshotIncentive.p: SnapShot GO! The hotel industry’s  first cloud-based demand management platform for secure and transparent forecast, strategy and budget management.

saveTime.title: Save time
saveTime.paragraph: No more Excel sheets Automated data collection Intuitive data preparation

incCoWork.title: Tame the data
incCoWork.paragraph: Rolling performance environment Customised views & visualisation Secure & transparent

tameData.title: Increase co-working
tameData.paragraph: Align commercial objectives Streamline communication Central access

pinkDivider.title: SNAPSHOT GO!
pinkDivider.subTitle: HOTEL DEMAND MANAGEMENT IN THE CLOUD

description.title: SnapShot GO! is quick and easy to set-up and is changing the mindset of how hotels plan and manage their demand.
description.li2: Reviewing your hotel’s pricing and distribution strategy
description.li4: Automation of PMS, competitor benchmark & reputation data
description.em: ...all in one structured online platform, accessible from any location or device.

signUp.title: I AM INTERESTED!
signUp.description: SnapShot is running an exclusive introductory offer for hotels located in Amsterdam, Berlin or London.
signUp.p: This offer runs until 31.12.2014 at a special subscription fee of 950 € per year.
signUp.name: Name
